pullrequest.title: Added brackets and fixed spacing, no functional changes

content.raw:
Maybe we can add some guidelines to the wiki then, since there isn't always 100% agreement about the definition of a bug.

* Style / whitespace fixes are not bugs unless they fix the code_check.sh results.
* Adding a new test is a feature, not a bug fix. (I'm pretty sure that's our policy).
content.html:
Maybe we can add some guidelines to the wiki then, since there isn't always 100% agreement about the definition of a bug.

  • Style / whitespace fixes are not bugs unless they fix the code_check.sh results.
  • Adding a new test is a feature, not a bug fix. (I'm pretty sure that's our policy).
